issue.title: www.pcloud.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://www.pcloud.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pcloud.com) ### Comment > Hello, I tried to configure AdGuard to not filter this site on MacOS and it didn't work and it continues to limit uploads to the site www.pcloud.com on iPhone/IOS. It worked. I'm waiting for a solution or update that resolves this issue. thanks ### Screenshots

issue.title: Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac, Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version 4.3.46 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly, AdGuard gets detected on a website ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://decrypt.day/app/id6475033368#download-box ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other AdGuard Experimental filter ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Hide your User-Agent (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. User: @mikeaotrinh Click on blue button Download 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: y>
Screenshot N:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition
